title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 186.3 - Armored car guard registration: staggered schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 186.3 - Armored car guard registration: staggered schedule

State Regulations
(a) All individuals hired on or after

September 10, 1998 as armored car guards in New York State shall be registered
in accordance with the provisions of article 8-C of the General Business

Law. (b) All individuals hired
prior to September 10, 1998 as armored car guards in New York State shall be
registered in accordance with the provisions of article 8-C of the General

Business Law as follows: (1)
those individuals
hired prior to September 10, 1998 in an even year shall be registered by March
10, 1999; and
(2)
those individuals
hired prior to September 10, 1998 in an odd year shall be registered by

September 10, 1999. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
186.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
